mapper.select: SELECT CEO_ID ceoId, CEO_NAME ceoName, COM_NUM comNum, COM_ID comId, COM_NAME comName, COM_ADDRESS comAddress, COM_CATEGORY comCateGory, COM_NOTICE comNotice, COM_NOTICE_IMG comNoticeImg, MIN_PRICE minPrice, DELIVERYPAY deliverypay, FREEDELIVERY freeDelivery, BUSINESSTIME businesstime, DELIVERYZONE deliveryZone, APPDATE appDate, COM_PHONE comPhone from company where COM_ID = #{comId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMPANY SET DELIVERYPAY = #{deliverypay}, BUSINESSTIME = #{businesstime}, COM_PHONE = #{comPhone} where COM_ID = #{comId}
UPDATE COMPANY SET COM_NOTICE = #{comNotice}, COM_NOTICE_IMG = #{comNoticeImg} where COM_ID = #{comId}
UPDATE COMPANY SET COM_NOTICE = #{comNotice}, COM_NOTICE_IMG = #{comNoticeImg} where COM_ID = #{comId}
UPDATE COMPANY SET COM_PHONE = #{comPhone} where COM_ID = #{comId}
mapper.select: select ORDER_NUM orderNum, ORDERDATE orderDate, ORDER_RESULT orderResult, COM_ID comId , ORDERSTATE orderState , TOTALPRICE totalPrice from ORDERLIST WHERE COM_ID = #{comId} AND ORDER_RESULT = '주문접수'

select ORDER_NUM orderNum, ORDERDATE orderDate, ORDER_RESULT orderResult, COM_ID comId from ORDERLIST WHERE COM_ID = #{comId} AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY ORDERDATE DESC

SELECT O.ORDER_NUM orderNum, O.ORDERDATE orderDate, O.METHODSPAYMENT methodsPayment, O.ORDER_RESULT orderResult, O.ORDER_ADDRESS orderAddress, O.ORDER_REQUEST orderRequest, O.MENU_ID menuId, O.COM_ID comId, O.ORDERSITUATION orderSituation, O.INSTALMENT instalment, O.COUPON coupon, O.ORDERSTATE orderState, O.MEM_ID memId, M.MENU_NAME menuName, M.MENU_PRICE menuPrice FROM ORDERLIST O JOIN MENU M ON O.MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID JOIN USERMEMBER U ON O.MEM_ID = U.MEM_ID JOIN COMPANY C ON O.COM_ID = C.COM_ID WHERE O.ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum}

SELECT R.ORDER_NUM orderNum,R.REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent,R.REVIEW_STAR reviewStar,R.REIVEW_IMG reviewImg, R.REVIEW_DATE reviewDate,R.CEOREPLIES ceoreplies, O.COM_ID comId,O.MEM_ID memId FROM REVIEW R JOIN ORDERLIST O ON R.ORDER_NUM = O.ORDER_NUM WHERE O.COM_ID = #{comId} ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT R.ORDER_NUM orderNum,R.REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent,R.REVIEW_STAR reviewStar,R.REIVEW_IMG reviewImg, R.REVIEW_DATE reviewDate,R.CEOREPLIES ceoreplies, O.COM_ID comId,O.MEM_ID memId FROM REVIEW R JOIN ORDERLIST O ON R.ORDER_NUM = O.ORDER_NUM WHERE O.COM_ID = #{comId} AND TO_DATE(R.REVIEW_DATE) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC

SELECT R.ORDER_NUM orderNum,R.REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent,R.REVIEW_STAR reviewStar,R.REIVEW_IMG reviewImg, R.REVIEW_DATE reviewDate,R.CEOREPLIES ceoreplies, O.COM_ID comId,O.MEM_ID memId FROM REVIEW R JOIN ORDERLIST O ON R.ORDER_NUM = O.ORDER_NUM WHERE O.COM_ID = #{comId} and R.CEOREPLIES is null ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC
